comments.content: Looks hand lettered from the two e shapes being different - art not font.
BTW - They do use McKenna HandLetter by Old Nick for the rest of Menu typography.

I agree with Bob, most likely hand-lettered.

The style is called upright script, and though I didn't find any typefaces with the same evenness of line and calligraphic flare, the following faces have a similar vibe (to greater and lesser degrees):

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/romany/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/romany/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ascender/romany/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/society-page-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/society-page-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/society-page-nf/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jonahfonts/georgie/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jonahfonts/georgie/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jonahfonts/georgie/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fling/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fling/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fling/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pelavin/mimosa/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pelavin/mimosa/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/pelavin/mimosa/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/mrs-blackfort/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/mrs-blackfort/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/mrs-blackfort/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/typo-upright/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/typo-upright/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/typo-upright/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/samantha-upright-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/samantha-upright-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/samantha-upright-script/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipo-pepel/kids-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipo-pepel/kids-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipo-pepel/kids-script/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontdiner/cocktail-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontdiner/cocktail-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontdiner/cocktail-script/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/martina-flor/wonderhand/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/martina-flor/wonderhand/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/martina-flor/wonderhand/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jbfoundry/simple-ronde/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jbfoundry/simple-ronde/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jbfoundry/simple-ronde/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jbfoundry/old-french-school/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jbfoundry/old-french-school/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jbfoundry/old-french-school/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/bella-donna/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/bella-donna/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/bella-donna/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fenotype/mishka/")

You may also like **[Aya Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150310000144/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=FontDiner%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Aya%20Script%20-%20Regular&fid=96d186c2af2545fa26da958e590dd1b9&fsize=60&text=Claudette&wrap=2)** by Crystal Kluge, Stuart Sandler [2012]
Good find Fivos - very close for a font!
